13759.「……わからないか？ 泉の かげりが。\n 今 ともしびの木に触れれば\n お前:
Don't you see? The spring is darkened. If you
touch the Lamplight Tree now, it will stain
your soul.

13760.「ザホック！\n すぐに 浄化の儀を始めよう。:
Zahok! Let us begin the purification ritual
immediately.

13762.「神の鏡が 映すは光……。: The gods' mirror reflects the light...

13763.「影よ…… 闇夜のもとへ帰れ！: Shadows... return to the darkness of night!

13765.「ああ。浄化は 無事に終わった。\n 枝を１本 拝借して\n あの香術師に 持ち:
Yes. The purification was successful. Let us
take a branch back to the perfumer.

13767.「お前は 誰だ？ なぜ こんな所へ？: Who are you? What are you doing here?

13768.「……なるほどな。\n <pc> お前は あの香術師に頼まれ\n 私の身を案じて:
...<pc>. I see. The perfumer was
concerned for my safety, and asked you to
come.

13770.「<pc>さん。\n 我らは みかがみの泉の かげりに気づいて\n 浄化の儀の:
<pc>. We were preparing for the
purification rite when we noticed the Mirror
Fountain had gone dark.

13771.「どうやって この場所を知り得たか わからぬが\n こんな時に お前のような者と:
I don't know how you came to know of this
place, but perhaps it is the will of the gods
that I met you here at this time.

13772.「さて。用も 済んだことだ。\n アズランの キリカ聖堂に戻るとしよう。\n <:
Our work here is finished. Let us return to
Kirika Shrine in Azlan. You should come too,
<pc>.

13774.「ヘルガ僧正から 話は聞きました。\n 結局 いらぬ心配だったようで……\n い:
Priest Helga told me about it. Guess I was
worried about nothing after all... sorry for
all the trouble.

13775.「でも おかげさまで\n 無事に ともしびの木が 手に入りました！:
But thanks to your help, we got the Lamplight
Tree branch!

13776.「ほらっ いい香りでしょう？\n この ともしびの木の香りが\n 魔物は 大の苦:
See? Isn't it a nice aroma? It's said that the
scent of the Lamplight Tree can keep monsters
away.

13777.「これがあれば 森に入っても安心！\n ……ということで 薬草摘みの方に\n た:
With this, you can enter the forest without
worry! I'm sure the medicinal herb pickers
will be very pleased.

13778.「おっと いけません。\n <pc>さんに ヘルガ僧正から\n お話が あるそう:
Oops, sorry. Priest Helga said she wanted to
speak to you, <pc>.

13779.「聞いたぞ <pc>。\n 我らが キリカ修道会への入門を\n 望んでいるそうだ:
I've heard about you, <pc>. You
wish to be initiated into the Kirika Order.

13780.「お前のチカラは すでに見せてもらった。\n キリカ修道会の僧侶として 認めよう:
You have already shown me what you are capable
of. I hereby recognize you as a priest of the
Kirika Order.

13782.「ええ ええ。もちろんですとも……。\n 新たな兄弟 <pc>を\n ここに 迎:
Yes, yes, of course... Let us welcome our new
sibling <pc> into the fold.

13783.「<pc>。私たち キリカ修道会は\n 大いなる エルドナ神の教えのもと\n 多:
<pc>. We, the Kirika Order, have
saved many people from calamity under the
teachings of the great Eldona.

13784.「あなたも エルドナ神の御手となり\n 偉大な仕事を になうのです。\n いっそ:
You too shall become the hand of Eldona, and
perform great deeds. Remember to be diligent
in your work.

13785.「それから ヘルガ僧正。\n <pc>の師は あなたに まかせます。:
Now then, Priest Helga. I will leave
<pc> under your tutelage.

13787.「……そういうわけだ。\n これからは 師である私の教えに従え。:
...And there you have it. From now on, I shall
serve as your teacher.

13788.「お前の入門を祝って これを さずけよう。\n よろしくな <pc>。:
I offer this to congratulate you on your
initiation. I look forward to working with
you, <pc>.

13791.「さて。私は しばし 出かける。\n 行くぞ ザホック！:
I'll be taking my leave now. With me,
Zahok!

13792.「はい ヘルガ僧正。\n よろこんで おともいたします。:
Yes, Priest Helga. I am happy to accompany
you.

13793.「<pc>よ。修練を積むのだ。\n 時が過ぎれば 私は 戻ってくる。\n 僧侶と:
You must continue your training,
<pc>. In time, I will return.
Come here as a priest when I do.

13794.「お前には 期待しているぞ。: I have high expectations of you.

27397.「そうそう。私からのお礼も まだでしたね。\n 一緒に 受け取ってください。\n:
Oh, yes. You haven't received a reward from
me, yet. Please take this as well. Thank you
so much!
